DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test , nipple aspiration , ductal lavage , breast duct endoscopy , may help doctor detect cancer cell early plan effective treatment breast cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well nipple aspiration , ductal lavage , breast duct endoscopy work detect cancer cell healthy woman moderate-to-high risk develop breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Nipple Aspiration , Ductal Lavage , Duct Endoscopy Screening Women Moderate-to-High Risk Developing Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine incidence mild severe cellular atypia nipple aspirate fluid healthy woman moderate high risk develop breast cancer , define family history prior atypical biopsy . Secondary - Correlate cellular atypia breast cancer , biochemical tumor marker , growth factor , genetic protein marker participant . - Determine cancer risk incidence utilize method screen participant . - Observe natural history atypia participant total 10 year . - Determine whether technique may serve supplementary tool future screen participant . OUTLINE : Participants 50 year age undergo nipple aspiration every twelve month 3 year . Participants 50 year age undergo nipple aspiration every 18 month 4.5 year . Participants significant cellular atypia nipple aspirate fluid undergo ductal lavage endoscopy . Participants follow annually total 10 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1,000 participant accrue study within approximately 4 year .
